Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television Facebook
Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television Facebook

Facebook page for the Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television. Facebook page contains posts related to moving to Los Angeles, grants and fellowships, production fund awards, Tony Hawkins Awards, film festivals and screenings, documentary distribution, networking, alumni advice and accolades, competitions, women in film, the animation program, and other events.
